data.eml:eml: A new species of Euscorpius Thorell, 1876 (Scorpiones, Euscorpiidae) from Marmara Region of Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yagmur, Ersen Aydin, Tropea, Gioele (2013): A new species of Euscorpius Thorell, 1876 (Scorpiones, Euscorpiidae) from Marmara Region of Turkey. ZooKeys 281: 91-105, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.281.4732, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.281.4732
